description: The 'draw_data_table_group' function generates a group of data tables arranged in a grid layout. It is designed to create visual representations of data sets for educational purposes, aiding in the understanding of data analysis and interpretation.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Data Table Groups
stimulus_type_specification.description: The 'draw_data_table_group' function can create a collection of data tables, arranged either horizontally, vertically, or in an auto layout which calculates the optimal grid layout. It accepts a DataTableGroup object as input, which contains the data tables to be visualized, the desired layout, and an optional group title. The function has constraints on the number of data tables it can handle, determined by the processing power and memory of the system. Its primary educational purpose is to help students understand complex data sets by visualizing them in a structured and organized manner.

details: table_group_data: A DataTableGroup object containing the data tables to be visualized, the desired layout, and an optional group title
table_group_data.tables: The data tables to be visualized
table_group_data.layout: The desired layout for the data tables. Can be 'horizontal', 'vertical', or 'auto'
table_group_data.group_title: An optional title for the group of data tables
The number of data tables is limited by the processing power and memory of the system
The layout must be either 'horizontal', 'vertical', or 'auto'
The group title is optional and, if present, must be a string
The function generates a group of data tables arranged in a grid layout
The layout of the data tables can be either horizontal, vertical, or auto
The visual output includes the data tables, the layout, and an optional group title
